text:
Both:
♪ HEY YOU AND ME
AND THE BEAT ♪

♪ YOU AND ME
AND THE BEAT ♪

I'M SO FLATTERED
THAT YOU'RE SINGING MY SONG.

I THINK WE JUST
MADE IT OUR SONG.

A LITTLE GIRL IN OKLAHOMA
MADE A VIDEO OF HERSELF

SINGING "YOU AND ME
AND THE BEAT."

OH, I KNOW, I SAW THAT.
SHE'S SO CUTE.

HOW COOL IS IT
THAT MY SONGS ARE,
LIKE, OUT THERE NOW?

CAN I JUST SAY
I AM SO GLAD

THAT YOU'RE FOCUSING
ON YOUR MUSIC

'CAUSE IT MEANS YOU'LL
STAY HERE IN STEVENS POINT
WITH US.
YEAH, I REALLY LOVE THAT TOO.

PLUS IT GIVES ME
WAY MORE CREATIVE CONTROL.

AND, I MEAN, FROM NOW ON
I REALLY JUST WANT MY SONGS

IMPORTANT AND REALLY
MEANINGFUL TO ME.

WELL, GOOD FOR YOU, HONEY.
SO WHAT KIND OF IMPORTANT THINGS
ARE YOU WRITING ABOUT?

ALL RIGHT, SO YES,
I AM HAVING

A BIT OF A HARD TIME
FIGURING OUT WHAT
TO WRITE ABOUT.

WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
THAT SOUNDS GREAT.

Pete:
KAREN, SWEETIE, 
DO YOU HAVE A MINUTE?

OH, JOEY,
DO YOU WANT TO HEAR
ANOTHER SONG?

OH, WHAT'S THAT, MOM?
YOU NEED MY HELP?
BE RIGHT THERE.

IF THAT'S THE NAME
YOU'VE GIVEN TO THE GIANT FISH

THAT'S BETWEEN ME
AND THE TELEVISION,
THEN YES.

AND LOOK SIDEWAYS
THROUGH HIS SCALES,

YOU HAVE GOT A CLEAR VIEW
OF THE LOWER-HALF OF THE SCREEN.

I CALL IT
INTERESTING CONVERSATION PIECE.

PLEASE TELL ME
THIS ISN'T MY BIRTHDAY PRESENT.

NO, NO.
I BOUGHT HIM
FOR EVERYBODY.

YOU KNOW WHAT I WANT
FOR MY BIRTHDAY?

NO.
I WANT FIVE ITEMS
OF KNICKKNACK CLUTTER

PETE, WE NEED
EVERYTHING THAT'S HERE.

BESIDES, THERE'S
NOT THAT MUCH CLUTTER.

WELL, THEN WHY'D YOU PUT
THAT GIANT FISH OVER THERE?

- BECAUSE THERE WAS
NOWHERE ELSE TO PUT IT.
- A-HA!

- ♪ I'M UP WITH THE SUNSHINE ♪
- ♪ Let's go ♪

- ♪ I LACE UP MY HIGH TOPS ♪
- ♪ Oh no ♪

♪ YEAH, SHOW ME
WHAT YOU GOT ♪

♪ I DARE YOU,
COME ON AND FOLLOW ♪

♪ YOU DANCE
TO YOUR OWN BEAT ♪

♪ ALL I WANT TO DO
IS GO GO GO ♪

♪ YOU YOU,
THE OTHER HALF OF ME ME ♪

♪ THE HALF
THAT DRIVES ME CRAZY ♪

♪ YOU YOU,
THE BETTER HALF OF ME ME ♪

Joey:
PARKER, YOU RUIN 
EVERYTHING YOU TOUCH!

Parker:
WELL, I MUST HAVE 
TOUCHED YOUR FACE

UH-OH, SOUNDS LIKE TROUBLE
IN THE BRO CAVE.

UGH, I HATE GOING IN THERE
IN MY GOOD SHOES.

WELL, I WAS PRACTICING
MY WINDMILL KICK

AND KIND OF FORGOT
HOW EPIC MY POWER IS.
INTO A PRICELESS WORK OF ART.

YOU'RE WORRIED ABOUT THIS?
YOUR BEDS ARE TRASHED.

I COULD SLEEP
IN A DITCH, MOTHER.

BETWEEN A MAN
AND HIS KITTY CAT.

JOEY, I JUST WANT YOU TO KNOW
THE OLDER I GET

( groans ) I CAN'T LIVE WITH
THIS MONSTER ANYMORE.

YOU DO REALIZE WE DON'T
HAVE AN EXTRA BEDROOM.

AND IF WE DID IT WOULD BE
MY YOGA/SCRAPBOOKING ROOM.

SO I'M STUCK IN HERE
WITH JOEY,

WHO, BY THE WAY,
IS RAISING BABY OWLS

AT LEAST I DON'T JUMP
INTO YOUR BED

IF YOU KNEW ANYTHING
ABOUT SCIENCE

YOU'D KNOW THAT THUNDER
REPLICATES THE EXACT SOUND

OF AN EVIL SKY DINOSAUR TRYING
TO RIP APART THE UNIVERSE!

YOU'RE JUST GONNA HAVE
TO FIGURE OUT A WAY

TO MAKE SHARING
A ROOM WORK.

IF WE'RE STUCK
IN HERE TOGETHER,

WE'LL SPLIT
THE ROOM IN HALF.

HIGHEST ROLLER GETS TO PICK
WHICH HALF OF THE ROOM HE WANTS

OR GETS TO REACH INTO THE BAG
OF MYSTIFIED WHIMSY.

THE WIZARD DIE
SMILES UPON ME.

I AM HONOR-BOUND
TO RESPECT THE DIE'S DECISION.

SO, WHICH HALF OF THE ROOM
DO YOU WANT?

YOU'LL NEVER BE ABLE TO SET FOOT
IN THE OTHER HALF AGAIN.

WHAT? NO FAIR.
PARKER, I NEED A FLOOR.

I DIDN'T MAKE THE RULES.
YOU DID.

FIGURE THIS OUT WHEN YOU'RE
NOT STANDING ON MY FLOOR.

I'LL HAVE THE REMAINS
OF "JOSEPH TRIUMPHANT"
SENT TO YOU IN A BOX.

THIS IS A NUMBER FIVE,
TODD.

AND THEY CAN'T TELL
THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN
A FIVE AND A SEVEN.

MY GRANDMA'S A SENIOR
AND SHE CAN'T TELL
THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN

HE'S NOT TALKING ABOUT
YOUR JERSEY NUMBER, MADDIE.

THERE'S A LIST GOING AROUND
THAT RATES THE HOTNESS

OF RIDGEWOOD GIRLS
ON A SCALE OF ONE TO TEN.

THAT IS SO BEYOND
NOT OKAY.

THEY DON'T
GET TO RATE US.

BUT THEY DID.
I GOT A SIX.

HEY, THAT'S HOW MANY LEGS
MY FAVORITE ANIMAL HAS,

ARE WE GONNA
JUST LET THEM DO THIS?

BOYS DON'T GET
TO JUST DEFINE US,
DO THEY?

WELL, HISTORICALLY DICTIONARIES
HAVE BEEN WRITTEN BY MEN, SO--

MY FURY IS
AT YOUR DISPOSAL.

WE'RE GONNA TEACH
THAT TODD STETSON A LESSON.

WE'RE GOING TO EAT
HIS HEART

WELL, THAT IS
WHAT A STARFISH WOULD DO.

BY TAKING AWAY THE FLOOR,
I'VE SQUEEZED JOEY
OUT OF THE ROOM.

SLEEPING ON THE COUCH
OR IN THE BATH TUB.

BUT IT'S HARD TO CARE
WHEN YOU'RE BEING SWEPT AWAY

IN A TROPICAL PARADISE
THAT I CALL,

MY PARENTS BOUGHT ME
IN THE VAIN HOPE IT WOULD
ATTRACT FRIENDS,

I'M GLAD YOU HAVE
A GOOD SEAT

TO WITNESS THE BIRTH
OF SKY CITY.

THE TOP HALF
OF THE ROOM
BELONGS TO ME.

OOH, BETTER CROUCH DOWN
BELOW THE RED LINE,
LITTLE BROTHER.

LITTLE LOWER...
AND THERE YOU GO!

ANYTHING ABOVE FOUR FEET
IS ALL ME, BABY.

I'D RATHER BE
DOWN HERE ON THE BEACH.

SKY CITY WILL RULE
THIS ROOM FROM THE AIR.

BETTER GET OFF THE BEACH,
LOWLANDER.

NEW LIV ROONEY SONG,
COMING ATCHA.

♪ WHERE DO I PUT
MY ELBOWS ♪

NO.
I'M JUST SO NOT FEELING THIS.

SO TODD STETSON
AND HIS JERK-TOURAGE

ARE RATING ALL OF THE GIRLS
AT SCHOOL BASED
ON THEIR LOOKS.

WELL, WHO CAME UP
WITH JERK-TOURAGE
BECAUSE THAT'S REALLY GOOD?

I'M A SIX, MADDIE'S A SEVEN,
YOU GOT AN EIGHT,
WILLOW AND LACEY ARE FIVES.

I'M SO DISGUSTED.
I HAVEN'T EVEN CALCULATED
OUR AVERAGE SCORE.

AND WE ARE NOT
GOING TO STAND FOR IT.

IS THIS NOT
WHAT YOU MEANT?

( scoffs )
THAT IS SO
COMPLETELY OUTRAGEOUS.

I MEAN, YOU CAN'T JUST GO AROUND
RATING GIRLS LIKE WE'RE OBJECTS.

I FEEL LIKE EVERYWHERE
I TURN THESE DAYS,

SOMEONE'S TELLING GIRLS
WHO WE'RE SUPPOSED TO BE.

YEAH, ANYTIME
I PICK UP A MAGAZINE

I FEEL LIKE I'M NO GOOD
IF I DON'T LOOK
LIKE THOSE GIRLS.

AND I DON'T LOOK
LIKE THOSE GIRLS.

SINCE I WAS LITTLE,
BOYS WOULD TEASE ME

FOR LIKING SCIENCE
INSTEAD OF GIRL STUFF,

I MEAN, WHAT GIRL DOESN'T LIKE
A GOOD BUNSEN BURNER.

YOU KNOW WHAT I HATE?
WHEN SOME GUY COMES UP TO ME
AND IS LIKE,

HEY, YOU'RE REALLY GOOD
AT BASKETBALL...

LIKE, WHAT?
THAT'S SUPPOSED TO BE
SOME KIND OF COMPLIMENT?

WE HAVE TO GET BACK
AT TODD STETSON.

YOU KNOW WHAT, MADDIE?
YOU'RE RIGHT,

AND WE CAN TAKE
HIS RATING SYSTEM DOWN.

I MEAN, IT ONLY HAS POWER
IF WE BUY INTO IT, RIGHT?

I JUST WISH THIS CHAIR
HAD ARMS.

I DON'T KNOW WHERE
TO PUT MY ELBOWS.

LACEY, DO I HAVE
A SONG FOR YOU.

I WAS GOING TO BRING YOU
BREAKFAST IN BED, BIRTHDAY BOY.
I WANT MY NEGATIVE FIVE THINGS.

IT'S THE LEAST I COULD DO
FOR MY DEAR OLD POPS
ON HIS BIRTHDAY.

( whispers )
I DIDN'T GET HIM ANYTHING.
NO, I GAVE THAT TO PARKER

THE DAY HE AGREED TO TRY
ARTICHOKES FOR THE FIRST TIME.

IT'S LIKE I CAN STILL
FEEL IT'S THERE.

I DON'T EVEN KNOW
WHAT THIS IS,

BUT I KNOW
I HATE IT.

THE OVERALLS ARE
A SYMBOL OF OUR CHILDREN,

WHEN THEY WERE YOUNG
AND NEEDED US,

BUT THEY'RE EMPTY NOW
BECAUSE THEY'RE GROWN.
MOM, YOU JUST MADE THAT UP.

ALL RIGHT, I FOUND IT
IN THE STREET, BUT I LOVE THEM!

AND HOW ABOUT
THE MINI CHAIRS?

WHICH ONE SHOULD I
GET RID OF?

THAT'S LIKE ASKING ME TO CHOOSE
BETWEEN MY BABIES, PETE.

IF THAT'S AN OPTION,
TAKE JOEY.

I KNOW THAT IS
NOT YOU TALKING.

THE CHAIRS ARE
SMALL IN SIZE,

BUT THEY'RE HUGE
IN MEANING, PETE!

ALL RIGHT,
I THINK I'LL CHOOSE

AND I SAVED JUST ENOUGH ROOM
IN THE BOX FOR YOU, MY FRIEND.

SOMEDAY YOU'RE
GOING TO NEED BRANZINO.

AND HE WAS NEVER
YOUR FRIEND.

SORRY, DUDE.
IF YOUR SISTER'S A FOUR,
SHE'S A FOUR.

TELL HER TO SMILE LESS
UNTIL THE BRACES COME OFF.

WHAT DO YOU THINK
ABOUT THIS, TODD STETSON?
I'D CALL THIS A HOT MESS,

BUT THERE'S NOTHING HOT
ABOUT THIS AT ALL.

FROM EVERY GIRL IN THE SCHOOL
TO YOU AND YOUR JERK-TOURAGE.

WE DON'T CARE ABOUT
YOUR STUPID RATING SYSTEM.
BUT IF YOU CAN'T SEE THAT...

YEAH, IT SEEMS LIKE YOU'RE
TRYING TO SEND ME A MESSAGE.

I'M GONNA HAVE TO TAKE
TWO POINTS OFF FOR THAT, LADIES.

ALL RIGHT, WELL, NONE OF US CARE
WHAT STUPID NUMBER YOU GIVE US.

WELL, OUR WORK HERE
IS DONE.

SINCE WHEN DO YOU
WEAR DRESSES?

GO OUT AND BUY
A CURLING IRON?

I KNOW WE ALL AGREED
TO WEAR GARBAGE BAGS TODAY,
I WANT GUYS TO LIKE ME.

I DON'T WANT A FIVE.
WILLOW WANTS A SEVEN.

OKAY, BUT, WILLOW,
YOU DON'T HAVE TO DO THIS.

YOU DON'T HAVE TO BUY IN
TO TODD'S AWFUL RATING SYSTEM.

THIS IS THE WORLD
THAT WE LIVE IN.

THIS IS THE WORLD
THAT WE LIVE IN,

BUT WHY CAN'T WE
CHANGE THE WORLD?

CHANGING THE WORLD
SEEMS HIGHLY IMPROBABLE.

IT DOES SEEM
LIKE A LOT OF WORK.

I DON'T EVEN LIKE
CHANGING THE CEDAR CHIPS
IN MY HAMSTER'S CAGE.
I AM TRYING TO QUIETLY ENJOY

MY INDIVIDUALLY WRAPPED
SLICES OF SKY CHEESE.

SORRY, BRO.
IT'S A SLURP OF JOY.

LIFE'S PRETTY SWEET DOWN HERE
ON THE GOLDEN SHORES

WELL, I'VE GOT ENOUGH SKY CHEESE
AND CHOCOLATE MILK UP HERE

THE NATIONS OF
PARKLANDIA AND SKY CITY

HIS PEOPLE
CAN'T BE REASONED WITH.

WELL, I'D RATHER BE
A BARBARIAN

LOOK, I KNOW IT CAN
BE TOUGH SHARING A ROOM,

BUT WHEN YOU'RE GROWN UP,
YOU'RE GOING TO MISS EACH OTHER.

YOU'RE GONNA WISH YOU HADN'T
SPENT SO MUCH TIME FIGHTING.

YOU KNOW, I LOOK FORWARD
TO THE DAY WHEN WE'RE GROWN UP
AND MATURE.

THEN HOW ABOUT
SOME CHEESE PUFFS?

Karen's voice: 
♪ Whatcha doing, honey bunch ♪

- I'M TRYING TO WRITE A SONG.
- OH.

SO OUR TRASH-BAG PROTEST
WAS A MISTAKE.

THERE ARE ALWAYS GONNA BE
JERKS LIKE TODD STETSON
IN THE WORLD.

BUT WHAT WE CAN CHANGE
IS THE WAY THAT WE FEEL
ABOUT OURSELVES.

- WELL, GOOD FOR YOU.
- THANK YOU.

YEAH, TURNS OUT WHEN I'M
REALLY PASSIONATE
ABOUT SOMETHING,

THE SONG JUST KIND OF
FLOWS OUT OF ME.

KIND OF LIKE JOEY
AND THAT EXTRA BUTTERY POPCORN

HE HAD RIGHT BEFORE RIDING
THAT ROLLER COASTER.
IT JUST--

THANK YOU FOR THAT CLEAR
BUT DISGUSTING VISUAL.

FINE, I WAS GONNA GO
TO SLEEP ANYWAY.

TOLD YOU WE'D
NEED THIS STUFF.

Joey:
HEY, BEFORE THERE WAS
PARKLANDIA
SO I'VE WRITTEN A NEW SONG

FOR THE GIRLS AT MY SCHOOL
THAT I REALLY WANT TO SHARE
WITH YOU.

Some of the boys there
have been rating us girls

and that makes us girls
feel like we have to change.

But you don't have to change
who you are

of what a girl
is supposed to be.

- ( pop music playing ) 
- ♪ On a scale from one to ten ♪
♪ I am perfect like I am ♪

♪ Want me to change 
my everything ♪

♪ I'm so over all of these
voices around ♪

♪ It's my turn 
let's get loud ♪

♪ I'll show you 
what a girl is ♪

♪ Who cares about
a dress size ♪
♪ To show you what a girl is ♪

♪ You are exactly what 
you're made to be ♪

♪ Just to put yourself 
out there ♪

♪ I'll show you
what a girl is ♪

♪ Who cares about  
a dress size ♪
♪ To show you what a girl is ♪
♪ To show you what a girl is ♪

and please don't let anyone
tell you who you are.
♪ I'LL SHOW YOU WHAT A GIRL IS ♪

♪ THAT ALL OF ME
IS PERFECT ♪

♪ I'LL SHOW YOU
WHAT A GIRL-- ♪

( shouting )
OH, LIV, THIS IS BEAUTIFUL!

YOU ARE LIKE THIS GENERATION'S
CAROLE KING.

- YOU DON'T KNOW WHO THAT IS?
- NO.

I JUST REALLY HOPE THAT MY SONG
INSPIRES SOMEONE OUT THERE,
YOU KNOW?

I AM NOT ASHAMED
OF WHO I AM ANYMORE.

I WEAR MY CAPE
ON THE OUTSIDE.

EVERYONE SHINES
IN THEIR OWN WAY.
